jdbcService.sql: select distinct * from ~nodes n left outer join ~node_external_ids nei on nei.node_id = n.id where n.path like '%' || :parentId || '%' and (:q is null or lower(nei.external_id) like '%' || lower(:q) || '%' or lower(n.name) like '%' || lower(:q) || '%' or lower(n.title) like '%' || lower(:q) || '%' or lower(n.description) like '%' || lower(:q) || '%' ) and (:componentId is null or n.component_id = any(:componentId))
